document.full_text: the international air transport association (iata) said on thursday the global economy was recovering more slowly than expected, but was inching upward based on air traffic data, a key barometer of growth.
document.title: airlines gain from slow but steady global recovery: iata
lines_and_colors: the international air transport association (iata) said on thursday the global economy was recovering more slowly than expected, but was inching upward based on air traffic data, a key barometer of growth.
